channel.title: Question 1,2,3
channel.description:
Q1 well i still dont got an answer or a solution on my problem how to let a npc drop [u][b]10 or 20 coins[/b][/u]
Q2 how do i make the client load the drops out of npcdrops.cfg
Q3 does someone can give me an idee how autocast should look like how its coded? casue im not sure and mines didnt work after 5 times trying...
*/wicked destiny/*

item.title: Question 1,2,3
item.dc:creator: @kiaz kiaz
item.description:
@kiaz wrote:

  1. an idea on how it works

declare UseAutocast = false;
say if its on or off

Make the switch/buttion work and what spell

case 7038: UseAutocast = true; UseSpell = 1152; setSidebarInterface(0, 328); break; // Wind Strike Autocast
					case 7039: UseAutocast = true; UseSpell = 1154; setSidebarInterface(0, 328);break; // Water Strike Autocast

in process()
if(UseAutocast == true && actionTimer == 0 && fightingid != 0){
castspell();
}

in castspell();
you will have the attack gfx onplayer and
if(UseSpell == 1152{ windstrike
}
if(UseSpell == 1154){ waterstrike
}
thats just a quick inside…

you can go and download the openscape source in the downloads section for a betta view of how my code works

Read full topic
